item.title: Axel Rudakubana has been sentenced to a minimum of 52 years for the murders of Elsie Dot Stancombe, 7, Alice da Silva Aguiar, 9, and Bebe King, 6 at a dance class in Southport, UK, and the attempted murder of 10 other people. #Southport #UK #BreakingNews

item.title: Two 19-year-old passengers and an 18-year-old driver died at the scene of a crash near Wakefield, UK, police said. Five men were travelling in a black Seat Ibiza car at the time of the crash on Friday night. One man remains in hospital with life-threa
